import React,{useEffect}from'react';function Authenticate(_ref){var setAuthen=_ref.setAuthen;useEffect(function(){// Make a request to check the authentication status
fetch('http://localhost:3000/check_auth').then(function(response){if(response.ok){response.json().then(function(data){setAuthen(data.authenticated);});}else{throw new Error("HTTP error! status: ".concat(response.status));}}).catch(function(error){return console.log(error);});},[setAuthen]);}export default Authenticate;
